coreAtributes.name: Platemail Bracer
coreAtributes.description: A pair of hevay metal wrist guards with layered plate metal protecting the wrists and lower arms.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your platemail bracers.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s platemail bracers and roughly pull them off [npc.her] wrists.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your platemail bracers and roughly pulls them off your wrists.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s platemail bracers and roughly pulls them off [npc2.her] wrists.

replacementText.playerSelf: You put on the platemail bracers.
replacementText.playerNPC: You put [npc.name]'s platemail bracers on [npc.her] wrists.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly force the platemail bracers on [npc.her] wrists.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] puts your platemail bracers on your wrists.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly puts the platemail bracers on your wrists.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] puts [npc2.name]'s platemail bracers on their wrists.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s platemail bracers and roughly puts them on [npc2.her] wrists.
